transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_005343.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000311189.7. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.

contact.name: Nazneen Rahman
contact.address: Institute of Cancer Research, Sutton, Surrey, UK

annotation_set.comment: Annotation is based on Ensembl release 95 (GRCh38 primary assembly)

source.name: List of locus specific databases for HRAS
